messages.message: Hi team! I'm running into an issue on dogfood where I'm unable to create a new project using the New > New Project tab. Usually a list of options pop up for refiner project, extraction project, etc. but right now when I click on it nothing happens. Is this a bug / does anyone know how fix this? (apologies if this is the wrong channel)
oh that is bad, thanks for catching!

in this case, we have a Blueprint popover nested within a Pollen popover, and the issue is caused by the addition of `overflow: hidden` to `SPopoverContent` in Pollen

can we remove `overflow: hidden` here (https://github.com/instabase/pollen/blob/e963ed51466558c55380c013cbe20f2b049f4ff3/src/components/Popover/styles.ts#L22)? @Liam Callanan
